# Pictures of mimic species mentionned from the article 

## The Alcon blue butterfly 
( _Phengaris rebeli_ )

![](image/the alcon blue butterfly.jpg )

His larvae copies the smell of ants to be protected


## The mimic octopus 
( _Thaumoctopus mimicus_)

![](image/mimic-octopus.jpg )

This animal imitate up to 50 different animals to fear his predators


## The viceroy butterfly 
( _Limenitis archippus_ )

![](image/viceroy butterfly.jpg )

He uses batesian mimecry to pretend that he is toxic like the monarch butterfly, it is not true.


## The milk snake 
( _Lampropeltis triangulum_ )

![](image/milk snake.jpg )

He looks like a venimous snake but he is not venimous


## The lyrebirds 
( For example _Menura novaehollandiae_ )

![](image/The lyrebirds.jpg )

He copies another sound that he hears


## The Katylid 
( For example _Pseudophyllus titan_ )

![](image/Pseudophyllus titan.jpg )

He imitates the sounds of cicadas 


## The snail eyestalk flatworms , a parasite of gasteropoda
( _Leucochloridium paradoxum_ )

![](image/Leucochloridium paradoxum.jpg )

He takes control of snail to be eaten 


## The zone-tailed hawk 
( _Buteo albonotatus_ )

![](image/Zone-tailed hawk.jpg )

He looks like  of a vulture , specialy the turkey vulture by his behavior
